message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product for $17,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to go that low. How about we split the difference at $16,250?  It's still a good deal for both of us.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet you halfway. My maximum offer remains at $15,000. I hope we can find a way to reach an agreement that works for both of us.
